net.marfgamer.jraknet.session

Class RakNetSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.marfgamer.jraknet.session.RakNetSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeminusRakNetPeer, UnumRakNetPeer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RakNetClientSession, RakNetServerSession

    public abstract class RakNetSession
extends java.lang.Object
implements UnumRakNetPeer, GeminusRakNetPeer
    This class is used to easily manage connections in RakNet
    Author:
    MarfGamer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RakNetSession(long guid, int maximumTransferUnit, io.netty.channel.Channel channel, java.net.InetSocketAddress address) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enableLatencyDetection(boolean enabled)
      Enables/disables latency detection, when disabled the latency will always return -1

      Note: If the session is not yet in the keep alive state then the packets needed to detect the latency will not be sent until then
      java.net.InetSocketAddress getAddress()
      Returns the session's address

      Returns the session's globally unique ID (GUID)

      • enableLatencyDetection

        public void enableLatencyDetection(boolean enabled)
        Enables/disables latency detection, when disabled the latency will always return -1

        Note: If the session is not yet in the keep alive state then the packets needed to detect the latency will not be sent until then
        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether or not latency detection is enabled
